img_summary: The image depicts the **Body-Warming Powder**, an uncommon consumable item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is used to instantly remove the Chilled State and temporarily boost Chill Resistance. Players can craft it at the Shrine store under "Make Medicines" after assisting Xu Dog in Sandgate Village - Village Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge. Crafting requires **1 Fire Bellflower** and **1 Jade Lotus**.
